com.defano.jmonet.canvas.layer

Class ImageLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.defano.jmonet.canvas.layer.ImageLayer

  • public class ImageLayer
extends Object
    A layer in a layered image.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ImageLayer(BufferedImage image)
      Creates a layer in which the given image is drawn atop a destination image using AlphaComposite.SRC_OVER at the image's origin (0, 0).
      ImageLayer(BufferedImage image, AlphaComposite composite)
      Creates a layer in which a given image is drawn atop a destination image using a provided composite mode at the destination image's origin (0, 0).
      ImageLayer(Point location, BufferedImage image, AlphaComposite composite)
      Creates a lyer in which a given image is drawn atop a destination image at a given position using a provided composite mode.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AlphaComposite getComposite()
      Gets the alpha composite mode used to overlay this image on the base.
      BufferedImage getImage()
      Gets the image associated with this layer.
      Point getLocation()
      Gets the location of this image layer.
      Dimension getSize()
      Gets the dimensions of the image represented by this layer.
      void paint(Graphics2D g, Double scale, Rectangle clip)
      Draws the visible portion of this image layer onto a graphics context at scale.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ImageLayer

        public ImageLayer(BufferedImage image)
        Creates a layer in which the given image is drawn atop a destination image using AlphaComposite.SRC_OVER at the image's origin (0, 0).
        Parameters:
        image - The image comprising this layer.

      • ImageLayer

        public ImageLayer(BufferedImage image,
                  AlphaComposite composite)
        Creates a layer in which a given image is drawn atop a destination image using a provided composite mode at the destination image's origin (0, 0).
        Parameters:
        image - The image comprising this layer
        composite - The composite mode this layer is drawn with

      • ImageLayer

        public ImageLayer(Point location,
                  BufferedImage image,
                  AlphaComposite composite)
        Creates a lyer in which a given image is drawn atop a destination image at a given position using a provided composite mode.
        Parameters:
        location - The location on the destination where this layer should be drawn
        image - The image to be drawn
        composite - The composite mode to draw with

    • Method Detail

      • paint

        public void paint(Graphics2D g,
                  Double scale,
                  Rectangle clip)
        Draws the visible portion of this image layer onto a graphics context at scale.
        Parameters:
        g - The graphics context on which to draw.
        scale - The scale at which to draw the image (1.0 or null means no scaling). When null, no scaling will be provided.
        clip - The clipping rectangle; only the portion of this image bounded by this rectangle will be drawn. When null, the entire image will be drawn. Note that this rectangle is represented in scaled coordinate space. This, the rect (10,10), (100,100) when scale is 2.0 refers to the this layer's sub image (5,5),(50,50).

      • getLocation

        public Point getLocation()
        Gets the location of this image layer. Coordinates are relative to the base image this layer is being drawn upon.
        Returns:
        The layer's location.

      • getImage

        public BufferedImage getImage()
        Gets the image associated with this layer.
        Returns:
        The layer's image.

      • getComposite

        public AlphaComposite getComposite()
        Gets the alpha composite mode used to overlay this image on the base.
        Returns:
        The overlay alpha mode.

      • getSize

        public Dimension getSize()
        Gets the dimensions of the image represented by this layer.
        Returns:
        The image size
